reviewText: I decided to get the whole series of Everybody Loves Raymond on dvd, because I wanted to have more variety of comdies in my collection. I love the writing and acting in this show. The writers take things from their real lives and put it into this show to help people see what marriage is like froman exaggerated perspective.

reviewText: If you"ve ever watched an episode of Raymond, then try  to imagine 50 episodes bundled into one fantastic package with a price tag lower than most one season series of episodes. This item even contains the final episode which was presented perfectly and includes a behind the scenedocumentary on the making of that episode. Definitely worth the price and the pleasure! Enjoy!
